body:
Forgive me for asking a question that is probably answered elsewhere but I could not find it.

Is there an option that forces spack to keep all the build directories for packages that it thinks have built correctly? I have a failure that is impossible to debug since spack seems to clean out all the build directories thinking the build was successful. I know the build was not successful because some files that should be installed are not installed.
title: Option to keep all build files to help debug
